segments.text: Over to the left, I see the two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is attempting to reach into a cookie jar in an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small, wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable; the legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried he's going to tip it over and fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there with him, eagerly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand up, practically begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly in cahoots, secretly getting those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a sneaky operation they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find their little conspiracy rather amusing, despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to this whole escapade too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfect storm of unawareness and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt from that precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of them tumbling down with cookies makes me a bit anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
